tool_description: An all-in-one Youtube API solution. It provides both data and stream or download info. API solutions for video, shorts, channel, search, playlist, trending, comments, shorts sound attribution, hashtag, URL resolving, etc
name: YT-API
title: YT-API

api_list.name: Shorts Details
api_list.description:
Get Youtube Shorts video info or get **Suggested** Shorts video info.
Quota cost is 1 unit for Shorts Video Info
Quota cost is 2 units for suggested Shorts Video Info.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Available options:
- Shorts Video Id to get info or
- **WHATTOWATCH** for suggested Shorts along with info.

optional_parameters.name: extend
optional_parameters.description:
Extend the results to include more details. The value must be 1

Quota cost is +1

optional_parameters.name: params
optional_parameters.description: Shorts video param

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

api_list.name: Home Feed
api_list.description:
Get home feeds, region-wise & niche-wise.
Quota cost is 1 unit.

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination token
Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

api_list.name: Shorts Sound Attribution
api_list.description:
Get the Shorts original sound attribution listing.

optional_parameters.description: If the params value is not available then Shorts Video Id may be provided.

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: params
optional_parameters.description:
Attribution param available in the Shorts info Endpoint:
soundAttribution -> params

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination token
Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

**all**  for videos and shorts
**shorts** for only shorts

optional_parameters.name: params

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination token
Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

optional_parameters.name: lang

api_list.name: Playlist
api_list.description:
Get playlist details and video listing.
Quota cost is 1 unit.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination token
Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
Search videos, playlists, channels, or all of them.
Quota cost is 2 units.

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description:
Duration filter options:
**short**  - less than 4 min
**medium**  - 4 to 20 min
**long**  - more than 20 min

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Search type filter options:
**video**
**channel**
**playlist**
**movie**
**show**
**shorts**

Sorting is not available in **shorts**

optional_parameters.name: features
optional_parameters.description:
Video Features options:
**HD**
**subtitles**
**CCommons**
**3D**
**Live**
**Purchased**
**4K**
**360**
**Location**
**HDR**
**VR180**

Multiple features could be joined by ','
For example: HD,subtitles

optional_parameters.name: upload_date
optional_parameters.description:
Upload Date filter options:
**hour**
**today**
**week**
**month**
**year**

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Results Sort options:
**relevance**  [default]
**rating**
**date**
**views**

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination token
Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

api_list.name: Video Details
api_list.description:
Get all the details of the YouTube video.
Quota cost is 1 unit.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Youtube video id or multiple ids separated by `,`
For mutli id batch request, quota cost is +1 for each extra id.
`Note: Mutli id batch request is experimental.`

optional_parameters.name: extend
optional_parameters.description:
Extend the results to include more details like related videos/playlist, comment count, etc.
Available options:
1 = for likeCount, commentCount (~), subscriberCountText (~), relatedVideos [not supported for multi ids]
2 = for likeCount, commentCount, channelHandle

Quota cost is +1

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

api_list.name: Resolve URL
api_list.description:
Resolve URLs like handles, etc.
Quota cost is 1 unit.

api_list.name: Trending
api_list.description:
Get trending videos region-wise & niche-wise.
Quota cost is 1 unit.

required_parameters.name: geo
required_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region for which you want the trending data. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Trending type:
**now**
**music**
**games**
**movies**

Default is **now**

api_list.name: Download/Stream
api_list.description:
Stream or download info.
Quota cost is 5 units.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Youtube Video Id or Shorts Id.

optional_parameters.name: cgeo
optional_parameters.description: Country code in ISO 3166 format of the end user.

api_list.name: Convert/Translate/Download Subtitle
api_list.description:
Convert, translate, download the subtitle. 
To get the subtitle url, use `Video -> Subtitles` endpoint or `Video -> Details` endpoint
Quota cost is 1 unit.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Provide the Subtitle url.
Available in the `Video -> Subtitles` or `Video -> Details` endpoint response.

optional_parameters.name: targetLang
optional_parameters.description:
Translate to Language.
Valid codes are in the translationLanguages param of the `Video -> Subtitles` or `Video -> Info` endpoint response.
Or provide ISO-639 code of the language like es, zh-Hans, co, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
Subtitle format options:
**json3** [mime: json]
**srv1** [mime: xml] [default]
**srv2** [mime: xml]
**srv3** [mime: xml]
**ttml** [mime: xml]
**vtt** [mime: text]

api_list.name: Shorts Sequence
api_list.description:
Get Shorts sequence.
Quota cost is 2 units.

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description:
If the params value is not available then Shorts Video Id may be provided.
But it is not recommended.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

optional_parameters.name: params
optional_parameters.description:
**Sequence param**
Provide either of these values:
- **sequenceContiuation** value from Shorts Info Endpoint's response for **WHATTOWATCH**
- **continuation** value from the previous request's response

api_list.name: Related Videos or Playlists
api_list.description:

optional_parameters.name: geo
